item.description:
http://www.active.com...

This is a snowshoe 5k. I have never done one before, but I figure it should be a fun and low impact way to enjoy the winter running season.

If you don't have snowshoes, Dion Snowshoes will have loaner snowshoes available for those that would like to race but donâ€™t have snowshoes. If you need to borrow some, register ASAP to guarantee a pair.

The course will include both double and single track trails. Timing will be provided by 3C Race Productions.

Bring trail sneakers. If there is not enough snow, the race will be a trail run.

It sounds like it is usually a small field of runners, so lets plan to meet by the start.

As always, you are responsible for your fees...

Hope to see you there!

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Old Salem Greens Snowshoe Classic
